scenario_text.value: What’s wrong, Takuma? You seem nervous.

Uh...did you hear something just now? Like
someone’s voice?
I heard something that sounded really pretty.

Yeah, that’s it! Could you tell which way it
was coming from?
It sounded like it came from over there.

You mean the music room? Why don’t we go
check it out?

That pretty sound came from over there! The,
uh, myuuu-zick room.
